401_BODY: You can do this with the "Login" button at the top right corner.
401_TITLE: You must be logged in to view this page
403_BODY: If this is a subpage of an initiative, it may be due to the fact that you are not the author of this initiative.
403_TITLE: Unfortunately, you do not have permission to view this page.
412_BODY: Please go to the previous page and try again after refreshing the page. This error can also occur if you have cookies disabled in your browser. If the problem persists, please contact us.
412_TITLE: Unfortunately, the request failed due to security reasons.
422_BODY: Sorry, something in the submitted form doesn't seem to be valid. This could be our fault, so please contact us!
500_BODY: We are sorry, but something went wrong in our system. Please try one more time. If the error persists, contact our customer support.
503_TITLE: Rahvaalgatus is carrying out technical work. Our apologies!
ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED_TO_INITIATIVES_BODY:
Hi,

You have subscribed to receive Rahvaalgatus notifications. Since you had previously subscribed to notifications and confirmed your email address, you do not need to take any further action to receive notifications. You will continue to receive news about the progress of the initiatives.

If you've changed your mind and want to opt out of notifications, you can do so at {{url}}.

--
Rahvaalgatus
{{siteUrl}}
{{facebookUrl}}
ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED_TO_INITIATIVES_TITLE: You have already subscribed to receive notifications about new initiatives.
ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED_TO_INITIATIVE_BODY:
Hi,

You have subscribed to receive notifications for {{initiativeTitle}}. 

Since you had previously subscribed to receive notifications and confirmed your email address, you do not need to take any further action to receive notifications. You will continue to receive news about the progress of the initiatives.

If you have changed your mind and want to opt out of notifications, you can do so at {{url}}.

-
Rahvaalgatus.ee
{{siteUrl}}
{{facebookUrl}}
ALREADY_SUBSCRIBED_TO_INITIATIVE_TITLE: You have already subscribed to receive notifications about "{{initiativeTitle}}".
ANONYMIZE_COMMENT_CONFIRMATION:
Sure you wish to anonymize your comment?
An anonymized comment remains visible, but your name will be hidden.
CANNOT_SIGN_SIGNING_ENDED: Sorry, but the signing phase has already ended.
CERTIFICATE_NOT_FOR_AUTH: Certificate doesn't look like it's for authentication. It could be our fault, so please contact us and let's find out!
CERTIFICATE_NOT_FOR_SIGN: Certificate doesn't look like it's for digital signatures. It could be our fault, so please contact us and let's find out!
CERTIFICATE_NOT_YET_VALID: Unfortunately your certificate does not seem to be valid.
COAUTHORS_PAGE_COAUTHOR_DUPLICATE: A coauthor with the same personal id already exists.
COAUTHORS_PAGE_COAUTHOR_YOURSELF: You are already the author of the initiative.
COAUTHORS_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Coauthors can change the texts, translations and deadlines of the initiative. Coauthors can also make the initiative public or send it to the signature collecting phase. However, only you can send the initiative to the Riigikogu or a local government. When you accept the invitation, the name of the coauthor will appear with the other authors.
COAUTHORS_PAGE_REMOVE_BUTTON_CONFIRMATIO: Are you sure you wish to remove the coauthor?
COAUTHORS_PAGE_SENT_INVITES_DESCRIPTION: After logging in to Rahvaalgatus, coauthors can accept the invitation either going to their user profile (by clicking on their name at the top right of the page) or by going directly to the initiative page.
COMMENT_FORM_TOC: Before commenting please also read our terms of use.
CONFIRMED_INITIATIVES_SUBSCRIPTION: Thank you! You will receive email notifications of new initiatives.
CONFIRMED_INITIATIVE_SUBSCRIPTION: Thank you! You will receive email notifications of the progress of the initiative.
CONFIRM_EMAIL_SUBJECT: Confirm your email address for Rahvaalgatus
CONFIRM_INITIATIVES_SUBSCRIPTION:
One more step - please confirm your email address. We have sent a confirmation link to your email.
If you can't find the confirmation email in your inbox, look in your spam folder. If you still can't find it, contact us.
CONFIRM_INITIATIVES_SUBSCRIPTION_TITLE: Confirm your email address to receive notifications from Rahvaalgatus.ee
CONFIRM_INITIATIVE_SUBSCRIPTION:
One more step - please confirm your email address. We have sent a confirmation link to your email.
If you can't find the confirmation email in your inbox, look in your spam folder. If you still can't find it, contact us.
CONFIRM_INITIATIVE_SUBSCRIPTION_TITLE: Confirm your email address to receive notifications about "{{initiativeTitle}}".
CO_AUTHORS_TEXT: Good initiatives are born out of cooperation. Invite contributors to the initiative by name or email address. Coauthors have the same rights as you. Coauthors can also be added later to the initiative.
DEMO_SIGNATURES_N_HAVE_TRIED: Digital signing has already been practiced <big>{{count}}</big> times.
DEMO_SIGNATURES_SIGNED_TEXT: You have successfully digitally signed the file! You can now download and then open your digitally signed file. From the file you can see the time of signing, the validity of the signature and other relevant information. To ensure your privacy, the file and the association with you will be automatically deleted from the system after 15 minutes. Only the gender, year and month of birth and the time of signing remain to for the statistics.
EVENT_FINISHED_IN_GOVERNMENT_TITLE: The proceedings in the government agency have ended.
EVENT_NOTIFICATIONS_DELAYED: Notification sent to subscribers on <time datetime="{{isotime}}">{{date}}</time>.
EVENT_SENT_TO_GOVERNMENT_TITLE: The initiative has been sent to the government agency.
EVENT_SENT_TO_GOVERNMENT_TITLE_WITH_AGEN: The initiative has been sent to {{agency}}.
EXPLANATION_CONTENT:
Good initiatives are born out of discussions. That's why created initiatives have a three-day debate state by default; this means that you can collect digital signatures to your initiative within three days after the creation of the initiative. Use this opportunity to define the subject with like-minded people and, when the time comes, publish your initiative to create a broader discussion, co-write the text of the initiative and eventually collect signatures in support of the initiative.

The creation of initiatives and sending to Riigikogu is free, but donations for maintaining the platform are very welcome.
GITHUB_LOGO_TITLE: Rahvaalgatus is being developed at GitHub.
HOME_PAGE_HEADER_LOCAL_TEXT: Draft and submit to a local government a proposal with signatures from at least 1% of its residents with voting rights.
HOME_PAGE_HEADER_PARLIAMENT_TEXT: Draft and submit to the Estonian parliament a proposal with at least 1000 signatures and track its progress.
HOME_PAGE_HEADER_TAGLINE: Do you feel like some things could be done better in Estonia?
HOME_PAGE_SEARCH_SEE_OTHER: View initiatives only for the parliament or local governments. For older initiatives, see the initiative archive.
HOME_PAGE_SEE_ARCHIVE: Looking for older initiatives? See the initiative archive.
HOME_PAGE_STATISTICS_N_INITIATIVES_IN_LA: {{count}} in the last 30 days, of which {{parliamentCount}} to the parliament and {{localCount}} to local governments
HOME_PAGE_STATISTICS_N_SENT_ALL_IN_LAST_: {{sent}} in the last 30 days, of which {{sentToParliament}} to the parliament and {{sentToLocal}} to local governments. {{external}} sent on paper
HOME_PAGE_STATISTICS_N_SENT_IN_LAST_30_D: {{sent}} in the last 30 days {{external}} sent on paper
ID_CARD_ERROR_AUTHENTICATION_FAILED: Unfortunately authentication didn't succeed. It may be because of a technical issue or an expired ID-card. If you know it works on other sites and think it's a mistake, please contact us!
ID_CARD_ERROR_CERTIFICATE_MISSING: It looks like your browser didn't start the authentication or you cancelled it. Have you installed the ID-card software? Does it work on other sites? Sometimes it may help to restart the browser. If you need help, please contact us!
INITIATIVES_SUBSCRIPTION_DELETED: You have been unsubscribed from notifications.
INITIATIVE_404_BODY: This may be a broken link or just an unpublished initiative. If you think you should have access to the initiative, ask the author of the initiative to check if you've been given access to it.
INITIATIVE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_HAS_COMMENT: Unfortunately, an initiative with comments cannot be deleted. Please contact us for further assistance.
INITIATIVE_COAUTHOR_DELETED_SELF: You're no longer a coauthor of this initiative.
INITIATIVE_COAUTHOR_DELETE_SELF_CONFIRMA:
Are you sure you no longer want to be a coauthor?
If you change your mind later, you can ask the author to add you back.
INITIATIVE_COAUTHOR_INVITATION_PAGE_TITL: You have been added as the coauthor of an initiative.
INITIATIVE_COMMENT_TEXT_LENGTH_ERROR: The comment box should not be empty, but should also not exceed {{max}} characters.
INITIATIVE_COMMENT_TITLE_LENGTH_ERROR: The title should not be blank, but should also not exceed {{max}} characters.
INITIATIVE_DEFAULT_HTML:
{{title}}


Short (about 350 characters) or tweets - short (140 characters) summary – it is aimed at the better reflection of initiatives in the platform and social media


Proposal


What change is wanted


Justification


Why is it important


This whole text volume is a maximum of 12,000 characters
INITIATIVE_DISCUSSION_DEADLINE_ERROR: The initiative must be at least {{days}} days in the co-creation phase.
INITIATIVE_DISCUSSION_DEADLINE_EXPLANATI:
Set the time-frame for the co-creation phase: select the deadline date from the calendar. Your initiative will be in a discussion state for at least three days from publication, but we recommend a longer period (for example, a month).
If necessary, you can later extend the co-creation period.
INITIATIVE_EVENT_BY_AUTHOR_CREATED: Procedural information has been added and notifications have been sent to the followers of the initiative.
INITIATIVE_EVENT_RATE_LIMIT_BODY:
Rahvaalgatus allows you to add three procedural information entries in the space of a quarter of an hour, and it looks like you have already entered three.
Sorry for the wait, but restrictions are necessary to prevent spam - procedural information will be sent to all followers of the initiative, and unlimited notifications can be maliciously exploited.

Please try again in {{minutes}} minutes by refreshing the page.
INITIATIVE_IMAGE_ADD_IMAGE_DESCRIPTION: Use either a JPEG või PNG image that's sized 1200x675px or larger. The image will appear with the initiative when put on social media, for example. Make sure you've got the image author's permission to share it.
INITIATIVE_IMAGE_AUTHOR_EMPTY: If the image license requries and author permits, <label class="link-button" for="initiative-image-author-toggle">add an author or license</label>.
INITIATIVE_IMAGE_AUTHOR_URL_DESCRIPTION: If the author lacks a webpage, you can leave it blank.
INITIATIVE_IMAGE_AUTHOR_URL_LABEL: Link to image author or license
INITIATIVE_IMAGE_CONFIRM_REMOVAL: Sure you wish to remove the image?
INITIATIVE_IMAGE_ERROR_IMAGE_TOO_LARGE: Picture's over 3 megabytes. Please try again with a smaller image.
INITIATIVE_IMAGE_ERROR_INVALID_FORMAT:
Image doesn't seem to be in the JPEG or PNG format.
Please try again and make sure the extension of the file is either ".jpeg", ".jpg" or ".png".
INITIATIVE_INFO_AUTHOR_CONTACTS_DESCRIPT: If you want to give those interested the opportunity to contact you, add your contact details. Phone numbers, email addresses and websites are all suitable.
INITIATIVE_INFO_AUTHOR_NAME_DESCRIPTION: If you are submitting an initiative under an organization, please include its name. Your name as an individual is always visible. For co-creation. manage collaborators.
INITIATIVE_INFO_AUTHOR_URL_DESCRIPTION: Instead of an official website, it's also fine to link to a page on social media.
INITIATIVE_INFO_COMMUNITY_URL_DESCRIPTIO: You can also add a hashtag instead of social media groups.
INITIATIVE_INFO_ORGANIZATIONS_DESCRIPTIO: Add the organization name and link.
INITIATIVE_IS_IN_PARLIAMENT_COMMITTEE: Initiative is in the parliament, in {{committee}}.
INITIATIVE_MEDIA_COVERAGE_EVENT_PUBLISHE: Author or publisher of the article
INITIATIVE_PAGE_DESTINATION_UPDATE_DESCR: You can change the recipient of the initiative up to the moment you start collecting signatures. If you are not sure who to send the initiative to, contact us.
INITIATIVE_PAGE_DISCLAIMER: The ideas expressed in the initiative only represent the views of its authors and may not coincide with the views of the Estonian Cooperation Council, which manages Rahvaalgatus.ee.
INITIATIVE_SEND_TO_PARLIAMENT_NEEDS_ESTO: To submit your initiative add an Estonian translation of the initiative.
INITIATIVE_SEND_TO_SIGNING_NEEDS_DESTINA: In order to be sent to the signature collecting phase, it is necessary to first select the recipient of the initiative.
INITIATIVE_SEND_TO_SIGNING_NEEDS_ESTONIA: To start collecting signatures, please add an Estonian translation.
INITIATIVE_SEND_TO_SIGNING_WAIT: The initiative must be in the co-creation phase for at least {{daysInEdit}} days. You can send the initiative to the signature collecting phase in {{daysLeft}} days.
INITIATIVE_SEND_TO_SIGN_CHOOSE_LANGUAGE_: Choose the language of the text you wish to send to collect signatures. You can add translations later, but signatures are only collected for one version of the text. Although the initiative must be sent to the Riigikogu in Estonian, it is still allowed to collect signatures for Russian or English texts. In this case, however, an Estonian translation must also be attached before sending it to the Riigikogu. Once you start collecting signatures, you can no longer change the title or content of the selected text. Review the text carefully before continuing.
INITIATIVE_SENT_TO_PARLIAMENT_BODY: The Board of the Riigikogu shall decide on whether or not to accept the initiative within 30 calendar days.
INITIATIVE_SENT_TO_PARLIAMENT_TITLE: Initiative was sent to the parliament
INITIATIVE_SIDEBAR_SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to be informed via email
INITIATIVE_SIGNATURES_INVALID_TOKEN:
The code required to download the signatures does not appear to be correct.
Please double-check the link you clicked or contact us.
INITIATIVE_SIGNATURES_NOT_PERMITTED_DOWN:
Unfortunately, you are not allowed to download signatures.
If you think this is an error, please contact us.
INITIATIVE_SIGNATURES_NO_LONGER_AVAILABL: Signatures can no longer be downloaded.
INITIATIVE_SIGNING_DEADLINE_UPDATED: Initiative signing deadline has been updated.
INITIATIVE_SIGN_DEADLINE_ERROR: The initiative must be at least {{days}} days in the signing phase.
INITIATIVE_SIGN_DESCRIPTION_FOR_LOCAL: You can only cast your vote if you are at least 16 years old and a permanent resident of Estonia, using your ID card, Mobile-ID or Smart-ID. If the initiative is addressed to a local government, only the signatures given by the residents of that locality are taken into account.
INITIATIVE_SIGN_DESCRIPTION_FOR_PARLIAME: You can sign via the ID-card, Mobile-ID, or Smart-ID. You have to be an Estonian resident and at least 16 years old to sign.
INITIATIVE_SIGN_HEADING: Cast your vote to this initiative!
INITIATIVE_SIGN_PHASE_UPDATED: Initiative is now open for signing.
INITIATIVE_SIGN_TRANSLATION_WARNING: Note that the initiative's original text is written in {{language}}, but you read the {{translation}}.
INITIATIVE_SIGN_TRANSLATION_WARNING_SIGN: Your <strong>signature will however go to the English text<strong>.
Your <strong>signature will however go to the Estonian text<strong>.
Your <strong>signature will however go to the Russian text<strong>.
INITIATIVE_SUBSCRIBER_COUNT_ALL: No initiative subscribers yet, but {{allCount}} subscribed to the entire site.
INITIATIVE_SUBSCRIBER_COUNT_BOTH: {{count}} subscribed and {{allCount}} subscribed to the entire site.
INITIATIVE_TEXT_CREATED: The text of the initiative has been saved.
INITIATIVE_TEXT_CREATED_IF_PUBLISHED: The text of the initiative has been saved. As the initiative is public, the updated text will be visible to all.
INITIATIVE_TEXT_UNSAVED: You've not saved your text. You sure you want to leave the page?
INITIATIVE_UPDATE_AUTHOR_DESCRIPTION: If you no longer want to be the primary author of the initiative yourself, you can assign a coauthor to replace you. They can then send the initiative to the government as well as manage other coauthors. You will remain a coauthor after that. You can only change the author during the co-creation phase.
INITIATIVE_UPDATE_AUTHOR_NO_AUTHORS: To assign a new author, add a coauthor first.
INITIATIVE_UPDATE_AUTHOR_TITLE: Change the Author of the Initiative
INITIATIVE_UPDATE_AUTHOR_UPDATED: The author of the initiative is now {{name}}.
INITIATIVE_UPDATE_AUTHOR_UPDATE_UNAVAILA: As the initiative is no longer in the co-creation phase, it is unfortunately no longer possible to change the author.
INPUT_ERROR_FORMAT_EMAIL: This does not seem to be a valid email address.
INVALID_CERTIFICATE_ISSUER: Unfortunately Rahvaalgatus does not yet support your certificate. Please let us know about it.
INVALID_FORM: Sorry, but there seems to be a mistake
INVALID_INITIATIVES_SUBSCRIPTION_CONFIRM:
Unfortunately your subscription to receive notifications could not be confirmed.
Please try again by clicking the link in the email again or by re-subscribing to the notifications if necessary.
INVALID_INITIATIVE_SUBSCRIPTION_CONFIRMA:
Unfortunately your subscription to receive notifications could not be confirmed.
Please try again by clicking the link in the email again or by re-subscribing to the notifications if necessary.
I_HAVE_READ: I have read and agree with the terms of using rahvaalgatus.ee.
LOCAL_HOME_PAGE_HEADER_TEXT: Here you can draft and submit to a local government a proposal with signatures from at least 1% of its residents with voting rights.
LOGIN_TO_CREATE_TOPIC: You need to log in in order to create an initiative!

MOBILE_ID_CONFIRMATION_CODE_FOR_AUTHENTI: Make sure the control code matches with the one on your phone screen and enter PIN1 code of your Mobile-Id.
MOBILE_ID_CONFIRMATION_CODE_FOR_SIGNING: Make sure the control code matches with the one on your phone screen and enter PIN2 code of your Mobiil-Id.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_AUTH_CERTIFICATE_MISMATC: There has been an authentication certificate mismatch.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_DELIVERY_ERROR: Mobile signing was not successful. Either your phone is incapable of receiving the message or there is a problem with messaging service.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_DELIVERY_ERROR_AUTH: The phone is not technically suitable for the signing process or the network is temporarily down.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_INVALID_SIGNATURE: Signing failed because the signature does not match the certificate.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_INVALID_SIGNATURE_AUTH: Sign-in failed because the digital signature does not match the certificate.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_NOT_ACTIVE: Your certificate has not been activated. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_NOT_FOUND: This phone number and personal id don't seem to be associated with Mobile-ID. Please double check the phone number and personal id are correct.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_PHONE_ABSENT: Mobile signing was not successful. Your phone is either switched off or out of coverage.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_PHONE_ABSENT_AUTH: The phone is switched off or out of range.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_SIGNATURE_HASH_MISMATCH: The signature is invalid. Your vote was not cast.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_SIGNATURE_HASH_MISMATCH_: Sign-in confirmation from your Mobile-ID did not meet the security requirements. Please try again.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_SIM_ERROR: Error in phone SIM application. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_TIMEOUT: The signing request has expired. To vote, please start over.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_TIMEOUT_AUTH: It took too long to log in. Please try again.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_USER_CANCELLED: You have cancelled the signing flow and your vote was not cast.
MOBILE_ID_ERROR_USER_CANCELLED_AUTH: You have canceled the login process.
MSG_ERROR_40010_TOPIC: You cannot leave this topic as you are the last user with administrator permissions. To leave, please assign a new administrator to this discussion or initiative.
MSG_ERROR_40010_VOTE: You have cancelled the signing flow and your vote was not cast.
MSG_ERROR_40011_VOTE: The signing request has expired. To vote, please start over.
MSG_ERROR_40012_VOTE: The signature is invalid. Your vote was not cast.
MSG_ERROR_40013_VOTE: The mobile ID functionality of your phone is not yet ready. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40014_VOTE: Mobile signing was not successful. Your phone is either switched off or out of coverage.
MSG_ERROR_40015_VOTE: Mobile signing was not successful. Either your phone is incapable of receiving the message or there is a problem with messaging service.
MSG_ERROR_40016_VOTE: Error in phone SIM application. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40017_VOTE: Your signature has been revoked. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40020_VOTE: Incorrect phone number and/or personal identification code. Phone number has to include the country code: +372 xxx xxxx.
MSG_ERROR_40021_VOTE: Mobile ID functionality is not supported. Please double check phone number and/or ID code.
MSG_ERROR_40022_VOTE: Your certificate has been suspended or revoked. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40023_VOTE: Your certificate has not been activated. Please try again later. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40024_VOTE: Your certificate has been suspended. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40025_VOTE: Your certificate has expired. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40026_VOTE: Unknown certificate. Please contact your service provider.
MSG_ERROR_40030_VOTE: Personal identification code is already connected to another user account. Signing initiatives with the same code from different user accounts is not allowed.
MSG_ERROR_40031_VOTE: User account is already connected to another personal identification code. Signing initiatives with the same account but with different personal identification codes is not allowed.
MSG_ERROR_50000: We are sorry, but something went wrong in our system. Please try one more time. If the error persists, contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NOT_ALLOWED: Digital signing support is not installed. Please visit the website installer.id.ee to install the support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_CERTIFICATES: No card in reader. Check if the ID card is inserted correctly to the reader. New ID cards have chip on the back side of the card.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_NO_IMPLEMENTATION: Digital signing support is not installed. Please visit the website installer.id.ee to install the support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_TECHNICAL_ERROR: We're sorry, but something went wrong in our system. Please try one more time. If the error persists, please contact our customer support.
MSG_ERROR_HWCRYPTO_USER_CANCEL: You have cancelled the signing flow and your vote was not cast.
MSG_ERROR_INVALID_PHONE_NUMBER: Invalid phone number. Please enter your phone number with the country code: +372 xxx xxxx.
PARLIAMENT_ACCEPTED_SENT_TO_COMMITTEE: The initiative has been forwarded to {{committee}}.
PARLIAMENT_BOARD_MEETING: Meeting of the Board of Riigikogu
PARLIAMENT_DECISION_DRAFT_ACT_OR_NATIONA: It was decided to initiate a legislative draft or a deliberation on matter of significant national importance.
PARLIAMENT_DECISION_FORWARD: It was decided to forward the initiative to the competent institution to take a position and put forward a solution.
PARLIAMENT_DECISION_FORWARD_TO_GOVERNMEN: It was decided to forward the initiative to the government to form an opinion and to respond to the initiative.
PARLIAMENT_DECISION_REJECT: It was decided to reject the initiative.
PARLIAMENT_DECISION_RETURN: The initiative was returned to address its deficiencies.
PARLIAMENT_DECISION_SOLVE_DIFFERENTLY: It was decided to solve the problem raised in the initiative in an alternative way.
PARLIAMENT_HOME_PAGE_HEADER_TEXT: Here you can draft and submit a collective proposal with at least 1000 signatures to the Riigikogu, and monitor what becomes of it next.
PARLIAMENT_MEETING_DECISION_CONTINUE: It was decided to continue the discussion in the committee.
PARLIAMENT_MEETING_DECISION_DRAFT_ACT_OR: It was decided to initiate a legislative draft or a deliberation on matter of significant national importance.
PARLIAMENT_MEETING_DECISION_FORWARD: It was decided to forward the initiative to the competent institution to take a position and put forward a solution.
PARLIAMENT_MEETING_DECISION_FORWARD_TO_G: It was decided to forward the initiative to the government to form an opinion and to respond to the initiative.
PARLIAMENT_MEETING_DECISION_HOLD_PUBLIC_: It was decided to hold a public hearing.
PARLIAMENT_MEETING_DECISION_REJECT: It was decided to reject the initiative.
PARLIAMENT_MEETING_DECISION_SOLVE_DIFFER: It was decided to solve the problem raised in the initiative in an alternative way.
PARLIAMENT_NATIONAL_MATTER: Discussion on a Matter of Significant National Importance
PARLIAMENT_RECEIVED: Initiative has been received by the Riigikogu.
PLACEHOLDER_ADD_YOUR_REPLY: Add your reply to the comment by {{name}}
PUBLISH_INITIATIVE_CONFIRM_EMAIL: Before publishing your initiative, please confirm your email address by clicking on the link in the confirmation email you received.
PUBLISH_INITIATIVE_SET_EMAIL: Please set your email address before publishing the initiative.
REVOKE_SIGNATURE_CONFIRMATION: Sure you wish to delete your signature?
SEND_TO_LOCAL_GOVERNMENT_TEXT: The initiative will be sent to the local government with your contact details. The local government shall decide on the acceptance of the initiative within 3 months.
SEND_TO_PARLIAMENT_TEXT: The initiative will be sent to the Riigikogu with your contact details. The Board of the Riigikogu shall decide on the acceptance of the initiative for processing within 30 calendar days, after which the initiative shall be forwarded to the relevant committee of the Riigikogu. Read more from the Riigikogu website or from Riigikogu Rules of Procedure.
SENT_TO_LOCAL_GOVERNMENT_CONTENT:
The initiative has been sent to the local government! 
According to the law local government has three months to process an initiative. If the initiative complies with the Local Government Organization Act and the corresponding council begins to discuss the initiative, the local government shall notify the person submitting the initiative thereof in writing. This information will also be displayed in Rahvaalgatus.
SENT_TO_PARLIAMENT_CONTENT:
The initiative has been sent to Riigikogu! 

The parliament has 30 days to decide whether to process the initiative. If the initiative corresponds to the criteria of collective addresses, the Chancellery of the Riigikogu will inform the author of the initiative about which commission will discuss the initiative. This information will be publicized on Rahvaalgatus as well.
SENT_TO_PARLIAMENT_MESSAGE_TITLE: The initiative "{{initiativeTitle}}" has been submitted to the Riigikogu
SENT_TO_SIGNING_MESSAGE_TITLE: Initiative "{{initiativeTitle}}" was sent to collect signatures
SHARE_INITIATIVE: Want to help? Share the initiative…

SIGNATURE_NOT_REVOKED_NOT_SIGNABLE: Sorry, you can't revoke your signature after the signing phase has ended.
SIGN_ERROR_PERSONAL_ID_INVALID: Your personal id does not seem to be in the correct format. Please make sure it is a 11 digit number.
SIGN_ERROR_TOO_YOUNG: Unfortunately you are too young to give your signature. You must be at least 16 years old to give your signature to the initiative.
SMART_ID_CONFIRMATION_CODE_FOR_AUTHENTIC: Make sure the control code matches with the one on your phone screen and enter PIN1 code of your Smart-Id.
SMART_ID_CONFIRMATION_CODE_FOR_SIGNING: Make sure the control code matches with the one on your phone screen and enter PIN2 code of your Smart-Id.
SMART_ID_ERROR_AUTH_CERTIFICATE_MISMATCH: There has been an authentication certificate mismatch.
SMART_ID_ERROR_DOCUMENT_UNUSABLE: Smart-Id certificate is not available. Please contact us.
SMART_ID_ERROR_INVALID_SIGNATURE: Signing failed because the signature does not match the certificate.
SMART_ID_ERROR_NOT_FOUND: This id does not appear to have a corresponding Smart-Id.
SMART_ID_ERROR_TIMEOUT_AUTH: It took too long to log in. Please try again.
SMART_ID_ERROR_TIMEOUT_SIGN: The signing request has expired. To vote, please start over.
SMART_ID_ERROR_USER_REFUSED_AUTH: You have canceled the login process.
SMART_ID_ERROR_USER_REFUSED_SIGN: You have canceled the signing process.
SMART_ID_ERROR_WRONG_VERIFICATION_CODE: Unfortunately, the verification code you selected was incorrect. Please try again.
SUBSCRIBE_TO_COMMENTS_CONFIRM_EMAIL: But first, please confirm your email address by clicking the link in the confirmation email that was sent to you.
SUBSCRIBE_TO_COMMENTS_SET_EMAIL: But first, please set your email address.
SUBSCRIBE_TO_INITIATIVES_EXPLANATION: We'll email you about all initiatives in the parliament. If you'd like to subscribe to a single initiative, go to its page and subscribe from the sidebar.
SUBSCRIPTIONS_CONFIRM_DELETE: Sure you wish to unsubscribe from all initiatives?
SUBSCRIPTIONS_UPDATE_BODY: You've subscribed to the following initiatives with {{email}}. You can update your preferences or unsubscribe below.
SUBSCRIPTIONS_WILL_BE_DELETED: Will be deleted when update your preferences below.
SUBSCRIPTION_NOT_FOUND_BODY:
This could be because you have unsubscribed or have received an invalid authentication code in the email link.
Please contact us for support.
SUPPORT_PERSONAL_CODE: Personal id, if you wish to get income tax back.
SUPPORT_REDIRECT: To make a donation, you will be directed to Maksekeskus (Payment Centre), where you can make the transfer via your internet bank. Your donation will be made to the Estonian Cooperation Assembly, who'll use the funds for maintentance of Rahvaalgatus.ee.
THANKS_FOR_SIGNING_AGAIN: Thanks, though you've already signed the initiative.
TITLE_FIELD: Insert the topic of your initiative (you can change it later)
TXT_ALL_DISCUSSIONS_AND_VOTES_DELETED: All discussions and votes will be deleted.
UPDATE_INITIATIVE_NOSCRIPT: To change the text of the initiative, you need to enable JavaScript in your browser.
UPDATE_INITIATIVE_READONLY: As the initiative is already in the signature collecting phase, it will no longer be possible to change this text. However, you can add translations to the initiative. To do this, select another language at the top.
UPDATE_INITIATIVE_TO_LANG_DESCRIPTION: Although the initiative must be sent to Riigikogu in Estonian, Rahvaalgatus also allows signatures to be collected for Russian or English texts. However, before sending the initiative to Riigikogu, an Estonian translation must be added.
USER_EMAIL_ALREADY_CONFIRMED: Email address has already been confirmed.
USER_EMAIL_ALREADY_TAKEN:
Unfortunately, this email address is already associated with another user account.
If you do not have access to the other account to change your email address, please contact us.
USER_EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_TOKEN_INVALID:
Unfortunately, the confirmation link for the email address is no longer valid.
This could be because you have already confirmed your email address, or you changed the email address after the confirmation email.
USER_EMAIL_CONFIRMATION_TOKEN_MISSING:
Unfortunately, this confirmation link is not valid.
Please click the confirmation link in the email again or order a new confirmation.
USER_PAGE_COAUTHOR_INVITATION_ACCEPTED: Invitation accepted. You are now coauthoring the initiative.
USER_PAGE_COAUTHOR_INVITATION_DESCRIPTIO: As a coauthor, you can edit the texts, translations and deadlines of the initiative. You can also make the initiative public or later send it to the signature collecting phase. If you accept the invitation to coauthor, your name will appear alongside other authors.
USER_PAGE_EMAIL_UNCONFIRMED: Email address not yet confirmed. We have sent a confirmation link to your email.
USER_PAGE_EMAIL_UNCONFIRMED_USING_OLD:
The new email address is not yet confirmed. We sent a confirmation link to your email.
In the meantime, we'll continue to use your previous {{email}} address.
USER_PAGE_OLD_ACCOUNTS_INFO: Looking for your old initiatives? If you previously used a password or a Google/Facebook account to sign in, then you must link your account to your personal identification number. Please contact us at info@rahvaalgatus.ee
USER_SIGNATURES_EMPTY: You have not signed any initiatives yet. When you do, you will find an overview of the signed initiatives on this page.
USER_SUBSCRIPTIONS_EMPTY:
You have no subscription notifications yet. 
You can subscribe to receive notifications under each individual initiative.
USER_SUBSCRIPTIONS_UNCONFIRMED_EMAIL: To view your subscriptions, please add and confirm your email address.
USER_UPDATED_WITH_EMAIL:
Changes saved.
One more step - please confirm your email address by clicking on the link we have sent to your email.
VOTING_FAILED: Collecting signatures has ended. You cannot sign this initiatives anymore. Since the initiative did not get the necessary minimum amount ({{signatureCount}} signatures) by the set deadline, the initiative is stopped by authors. Rahvaalgatus.ee keeps the collected signatures for one year in case the initiative will be re-opened for signing.
VOTING_SUCCEEDED:
Collecting signatures has ended successfully! You cannot sign this initiative anymore. 
As the next thing, the authors of the initiative will send the initiative along with collected signatures to the Parliament of Estonia. 
Since processing the initiative can take some time, we recommend you to order notifications for this initiative by clicking "Keep me informed".
VOTING_SUCCEEDED_ON_LOCAL_LEVEL:
Collecting signatures has ended successfully! You cannot sign this initiative anymore. 
As the next thing, the authors of the initiative will send the initiative along with collected signatures to the local government unit. 
Since processing the initiative can take some time, we recommend you to order notifications for this initiative by clicking "Keep me informed".
